packageName: Google Calendar, Task, Reminder, and Gmail Search and Gmail Notification Device
author: ritchierich
releaseNotes:
v4.2.0: Fixed issue with sending files via Gmail notification
v4.1.0: Fixed NullPointerException error in parent GCal Search app, Added the ability to include emoji's within Gmail notification email subjects, Added the ability to specify a from Display Name within Gmail notification messages
v4.0.0: Re-release of the Gmail Search and Notification Device with new version number.
- Added ability to dynamically set the recipient and subject of a Gmail notification within the notification message
- Added the ability to specify a file within the Gmail notification message to be included in the email as an attachment
- When setting up new Gmail Search triggers, the search string is no longer required

Prior Release notes can be found in this post on the community: https://community.hubitat.com/t/release-google-calendar-task-reminder-and-gmail-search-and-gmail-notification-device/71397/2
